name: The 'I Just Stubbed My Toe' Flail
desc: Hop on one leg while shaking every other limb violently. Cursing is optional but recommended for maximum joint lubrication.

name: The Inflatable Tube Man
desc: Pretend you are outside a car dealership. Let your spine become liquid and let the wind toss your arms. No rhythm allowed.

name: The Mid-Life Crisis Disco
desc: Point aggressively at imaginary things in the corners of the room. Itâ€™s great for shoulder internal rotation and losing your dignity.

name: The 'Invisible Bees' Attack
desc: Vigorously swat at the air around your entire body. High-intensity coordination for people who hate traditional cardio.

name: The Interpretive 'Tax Season' Dance
desc: Move in a way that expresses deep financial despair. Lots of floor work, heavy sighs, and erratic spinal ripples.

name: The Biological Glitch
desc: Close your eyes. Find a 'sticky' spot in your body. Move into it and out of it using a rhythm only you can hear. Don't stop for 2 minutes.

name: Snake Soul Ripple
desc: Imagine a pulse starting at the base of your spine and moving up to your head. Let it wiggle every vertebra. It doesn't have to look pretty; it just has to feel fluid.

name: The Weightless Puppet
desc: Imagine you are suspended by a single string on your head. Let every other joint hang loose. Now, let the string go and move like you're underwater.

name: Joint Conversation
desc: Let your right elbow lead your body for 30 seconds. Then let your left hip lead. Follow the momentum wherever it drags you.
